subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Ten years ago this week, Lleyton Hewitt was the defending Wimbledon and United States Open champion, No. 1 in the world. On Wednesday he won a four-set match on Court 13.
snippet: Ten years ago this week, Lleyton Hewitt was the defending Wimbledon and United States Open champion, No. 1 in the world. On Wednesday he won a four-set match on Court 13.
